pullRequest.title: HIVE-23963: UnsupportedOperationException in queries 74 and 84 while applying HiveCardinalityPreservingJoinRule
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Avoid UnsupportedOperationException when calculating cost using HiveOnTezCostModel.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-23963?focusedCommentId=17169985&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-17169985
Why are the changes needed?
See above section.
Does this PR introduce any user-facing change?
no
How was this patch tested?
Run query 74 and 84 using a 30tb metastore dump:
mvn test -Dtest.output.overwrite -DskipSparkTests -Dtest=TestTezPerfDBCliDriver -Dqfile=query74.q,query84.q -Dtest.metastore.db=postgres.tpcds -pl itests/qtest -Pitests

nodes.bodyText: nit. Can we add the mapping to a map and do the lookup, instead of having a nested loop?

afterCommit.message: HIVE-23963: UnsupportedOperationException in queries 74 and 84 while applying HiveCardinalityPreservingJoinRule - address review comment

nodes.bodyText: If it is meant to be fixed in Calcite then we should create a JIRA and add an entry in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.Bug. We could even skip the JIRA creation and move this comment in Bug as CALCITE-X0000_fixed or something similar.
